documentation.text:
@dev Returns the amount of base units needed to represent `amount`
 full tokens by multiplying `amount` by 10^`decimals`

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct FixedPoint.uq112x112 memory,uint256) pure returns (struct FixedPoint.uq144x112 memory)
